snippet: The City Council speaker, Christine C. Quinn, plans to introduce a bill that would set goals to award city contracts, large or small, to companies owned by women and minorities.
abstract: New York City Council Speaker Christine C Quinn plans to introduce a bill that would significantly expand New York City's efforts to direct contracts to companies owned by women and minorities, regardless of the size of the contract
lead_paragraph: The City Council speaker, Christine C. Quinn, plans to introduce a bill that would set goals to award city contracts, large or small, to companies owned by women and minorities.

headline.seo: Quinn Wants City to Expand Direction of Contracts to Businesses Owned by Women and Minorities
headline.main: Quinn Seeks to Expand City Program Benefiting Companies Owned by Minorities and Women
headline.print_headline: Quinn Seeks to Expand City Program Benefiting Companies Owned by Minorities and Women
